AI Description: pyGenomeTracks is a Python package for plotting high quality and highly customizable visualizations of genomic data. It allows users to create complex, publication-ready figures to explore and represent genomics data effectively.
Core Features: Creation Of Customizable & High-Quality Genomic Data Visualizations, Support For Various Types Of Genomics Data, Including Gene Annotations, Chip-Seq Peaks, & Interaction Matrices, Highly Configurable Layout Options For Precise Control Over Track Placement, Sizing, & Styling, Integration With Popular Genomics Data Formats Such As Bed, Bam, Bigwig, & Vcf Files, Ability To Add Custom Tracks, Labels, Legends, & Annotations To The Plots, Interactive Plotting Capabilities For Zooming, Panning, & Exploring Genomic Regions
General Tags: Genomics, Data Visualization, Python, Genomic Data Analysis
